OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.e3Id: ID of the E3 for which the committee was selected.
ID of the E3 for which the committee was selected.
params.filter: Address of the contract that will coordinate committee selection.
params.threshold: The M/N threshold for the committee.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

committeePublicKey(uint256).details: This function MUST revert if no committee has been requested for the given E3.This function MUST revert if the committee has not yet published a public key.

params.e3Id: ID of the E3 for which to get the committee public key.

returns.publicKey: The public key of the committee.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestCommittee(uint256,address,uint32[.details: This function MUST revert when not called by the Enclave contract.

params.e3Id: ID of the E3 for which to select the committee.
params.filter: The address of the filter responsible for the committee selection process.
params.threshold: The M/N threshold for the committee.

returns.success: True if committee selection was successfully initiated.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CommitteePublished(uint256,bytes).notice: This event MUST be emitted when a committee is selected for an E3.

CommitteeRequested(uint256,address,uint3.notice: This event MUST be emitted when a committee is selected for an E3.

CyphernodeAdded(address).notice: This event MUST be emitted when a cyphernode is added to the registry.

CyphernodeRemoved(address).notice: This event MUST be emitted when a cyphernode is removed from the registry.

EnclaveSet(address).notice: This event MUST be emitted when `enclave` is set.

committeePublicKey(uint256).notice: This function should be called by the Enclave contract to get the public key of a committee.

requestCommittee(uint256,address,uint32[.notice: Initiates the committee selection process for a specified E3.
